citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 pm on
12/4/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, speaking to a family member who
stated the licensee would not be available for inspection, and calling the phone number and leaving a message. Failure to
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure
to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 pm on 
12/4/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, speaking to a family member who 
stated the licensee would not be available for inspection, and calling the phone number and leaving a message. Failure to 
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure 
to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
